description: This file defines classes and methods for evaluating the reliability of a model by checking tool calls, including data structures for results and evaluation logic with logging, printing, and file storage capabilities.

classes.name: ReliabilityResult
classes.description: Data class representing the outcome of a reliability evaluation, including methods to print and assert pass status.

classes.name: ReliabilityEval
classes.description: Class responsible for performing reliability evaluation of a model, including running the evaluation, logging, and result management.

methods.name: print_eval
methods.description: Prints the evaluation results in a formatted table using rich library.

methods.name: assert_passed
methods.description: Asserts that the evaluation status is 'PASSED'.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Performs the reliability evaluation synchronously, with options to print results, save to file, and log to platform.

methods.name: arun
methods.description: Performs the reliability evaluation asynchronously, with options similar to run method.
